/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a driver's viewpoint on the road, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is lined with a variety of vehicles, including cars and buses, adding a dynamic element to the scene. Buildings flank the street on both sides, their facades reflecting the architectural style of the city. The sky overhead is overcast, casting a soft, diffused light over the scene. In the distance, trees can be seen, providing a touch of nature amidst the urban landscape.
